Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Actions
    This interface represents all the actions that can happen on the model.
    Those actions are: Inserting, Renaming, Deleting, Saving, Unbinding, Changing workspace, Sharing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutModel  
    CircleElement
    public class CircleElement extends GraphicElement This class represents Circle which is type of Graphic element and it is drawn accordingly with x and y coordinates and size and color.
    ComplexElement
    public class ComplexElement extends Element This class represents a complex elements which handler is not yet implemented but can be easily added later on.
    Complex element is an advanced element which can accept all type of elements and of course other complex elements
    Document
    public class Document is a class which extends Observable and implements Serializable
    This class is used for generalization of Project, Workspace and GeDocument
    Draft
    public class Draft is a class which contains an array lists of floating nodes, nodes without parent.
    Element
    public abstract class Element which extends Observable and implements Serializable, MutableTreeNode, Actions
    Purpose of class is generalization of all types of the elements whit common characteristics.
    GeDocument
    public class GeDocument which extends Document and implements MutableTreeNode, Actions This class is model for our Documents inside the GeRuDok.
    GraphicElement
    public class GraphicElement extends Element
    Represents all the graphic elements inside the GeRuDok
    ImageElement
    public class ImageElement extends Element
    Represents all the ImageElements inside the GeRuDok.
    Page
    public class Page extends Observable and implements Serializable, MutableTreeNode, Actions
    This class represents the model of all the pages inside the GeRuDok.
    Project
    public class Project extends Document and implements MutableTreeNode, Actions
    This class represents the model of the projects of our GeRuDok.
    RectangleElement
    public class RectnagleElement which extends GraphicElement
    This is class which represents the model of our Rectangle graphic element in our GeRuDok
    Slot
    public class Slot which extends the Observable and implements Serializable,MutableTreeNode, Actions
    This Class represents the model of the Slot in our GeRuDok
    SoundElement
    public classs SoundElement extends Element
    This class represents model of all sound elements in our GeRuDok.
    TextElement
    public class TextElement extends Element
    This class represents the model of all text elements inside the GeRuDok.
    TreeModel
    public class TreeModel extends DefaultTreeModel
    In this class we are connecting our Model with the model of the JTree component
    VideoElement
    public class VideoElment extends the Element
    This class represents the model of all Video Elements inside of the our GeRuDok.
    Workspace
    public class Workspace extends Document and implements MutableTreeNode, Actions
    This class represents the model of workspace in our GeRudok.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeleteType
    This ENUM represents different deletion types
    COMPLETE_DELETE = represents delete of all references if node is shared DELETE_JUST_SELECTED = represents delete of just selected node no matter if it is shared UNBIND = when you want to delete the node, but not completely just save it to draft
